fields.name: forecastconsumedvalue
fields.label: forecast consumed value
fields.update_expression: if(cost != 0, forecastconsumed := newvalue / cost, forecastconsumedvalue := newvalue)

fields.name: forecastoverridevalue
fields.label: forecast override value
fields.update_expression: if(cost != 0, forecastoverride := if(newvalue == -1, -1, newvalue / cost), forecastoverridevalue := newvalue)

fields.name: forecasttotal
fields.label: total forecast
fields.description: This row is what we'll plan supply for

fields.name: nodata
fields.label: no data
fields.description: Indicates gaps in the sales history

fields.name: square table @ shop 2 @ Customer near shop 2
square table @ warehouse @ Customer near shop 2
varnished chair @ shop 1 @ Customer near shop 1
varnished chair @ shop 2 @ Customer near shop 2
varnished chair @ warehouse @ Customer near shop 1
round table @ shop 1 @ Customer near shop 1
round table @ shop 2 @ Customer near shop 2
round table @ warehouse @ Customer near shop 1
square table @ shop 1 @ Customer near shop 1
forecast.DeadAfterInactivity
fields.description: Number of days of inactivity before a forecast is marked dead and it's baseline forecast will be 0. Default is 365.

fields.name: forecast.calendar
fields.description: Name of a calendar model to define the granularity of the time buckets for forecasting.

fields.name: forecast.Croston_initialAlfa
fields.description: Initial parameter for the Croston forecast method.

fields.name: forecast.Croston_maxAlfa
fields.description: Maximum parameter for the Croston forecast method.

fields.name: forecast.Croston_minAlfa
fields.description: Minimum parameter for the Croston forecast method.

fields.name: forecast.Croston_minIntermittence
fields.description: Minimum intermittence (defined as the percentage of zero demand buckets) before the Croston method is applied.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_dampenTrend
fields.description: Dampening factor applied to the trend in future periods.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_initialAlfa
fields.description: Initial smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_initialGamma
fields.description: Initial trend smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_maxAlfa
fields.description: Maximum smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_maxGamma
fields.description: Maximum trend smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_minAlfa
fields.description: Minimum smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.DoubleExponential_minGamma
fields.description: Minimum trend smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.DueWithinBucket
fields.description: Specifies whether forecasted demand is due at the 'start', 'middle' or 'end' of the bucket.

fields.name: forecast.Horizon_future
fields.description: Specifies the number of days in the future we generate a forecast for.

fields.name: forecast.Horizon_history
fields.description: Specifies the number of days in the past we use to compute a statistical forecast.

fields.name: forecast.Iterations
fields.description: Specifies the maximum number of iterations allowed for a forecast method to tune its parameters.

fields.name: forecast.loglevel
fields.description: Verbosity of the forecast solver

fields.name: forecast.MovingAverage_order
fields.description: This parameter controls the number of buckets to be averaged by the moving average forecast method.

fields.name: forecast.Net_CustomerThenItemHierarchy
fields.description: This flag allows us to control whether we first search the customer hierarchy and then the item hierarchy, or the other way around.

fields.name: forecast.Net_MatchUsingDeliveryOperation
fields.description: Specifies whether or not a demand and a forecast require to have the same delivery operation to be a match.

fields.name: forecast.Net_NetEarly
fields.description: Defines how much time (expressed in days) before the due date of an order we are allowed to search for a forecast bucket to net from.

fields.name: forecast.Net_NetLate
fields.description: Defines how much time (expressed in days) after the due date of an order we are allowed to search for a forecast bucket to net from.

fields.name: forecast.Net_PastDemand
fields.description: When this parameter is false (default) only sales orders in the current and future buckets net from forecast. When set to true also older demands are used for netting forecast.
When this parameter is true the forecasting netting doesn't need a match between location of the sales order and the forecast.

fields.name: forecast.Outlier_maxDeviation
fields.description: Multiple of the standard deviation used to detect outliers

fields.name: forecast.populateForecastTable
fields.description: Populates automatically the forecast table based on the item/location cominations found in the demand table using parent customer when available. Default : true

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_dampenTrend
fields.description: Dampening factor applied to the trend in future periods.

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_gamma
fields.description: Value of the seasonal parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_initialAlfa
fields.description: Initial value for the constant parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_initialBeta
fields.description: Initial value for the trend parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_maxAlfa
fields.description: Maximum value for the constant parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_maxAutocorrelation
fields.description: Maximum autocorrelation above which the seasonal forecast method is always selected.

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_maxBeta
fields.description: Maximum value for the trend parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_maxPeriod
fields.description: Maximum seasonal cycle to be checked.

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_minAlfa
fields.description: Minimum value for the constant parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_minAutocorrelation
fields.description: Minimum autocorrelation below which the seasonal forecast method is never selected.

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_minBeta
fields.description: Initial value for the trend parameter

fields.name: forecast.Seasonal_minPeriod
fields.description: Minimum seasonal cycle to be checked.

fields.name: forecast.SingleExponential_initialAlfa
fields.description: Initial smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.SingleExponential_maxAlfa
fields.description: Maximum smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.SingleExponential_minAlfa
fields.description: Minimum smoothing constant.

fields.name: forecast.Skip
fields.description: Specifies the number of time series values used to initialize the forecasting method. The forecast error in these bucket isn't counted.

fields.name: forecast.SmapeAlfa
fields.description: Specifies how the sMAPE forecast error is weighted for different time buckets.
